actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-205.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 282 - 148 (Record Vote No: 174).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4242) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage economic growth through reductions in individual income tax rates, the expensing of depreciable property, incentives for small businesses, and incentives for savings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4242 (Tax revision).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4242) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage economic growth through reductions in individual income tax rates, the expensing of depreciable property, incentives for small businesses, and incentives for savings, and for other purposes.
